title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 143.3 - Procedure in a Superior Court for Drug Treatment upon transfer of case thereto
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 143.3 - Procedure in a Superior Court for Drug Treatment upon transfer of case thereto

State Regulations

Each action or proceeding transferred from
a local criminal court to a superior court and referred for disposition to a

Superior Court for Drug Treatment thereof shall be subject to the same
substantive and procedural law as would have applied to it had it not been
transferred. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
143.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
